message:
Command `python - << 'PY'
# create reproduce_issue.py
text='''from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.widgets import SpanSelector

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot([10, 20], [10, 20])
ss = SpanSelector(ax, print, "horizontal", interactive=True)
print('xlim after creating span selector:', ax.get_xlim())
'''
open('reproduce_issue.py','w').write(text)
print('Running reproduce_issue.py')
import runpy
runpy.run_path('reproduce_issue.py', run_name='__main__')
PY` executed with exit code 1.

python - << 'PY'
# create reproduce_issue.py
text='''from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.widgets import SpanSelector
fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot([10, 20], [10, 20])
ss = SpanSelector(ax, print, "horizontal", interactive=True)
print('xlim after creating span selector:', ax.get_xlim())
'''
open('reproduce_issue.py','w').write(text)
print('Running reproduce_issue.py')
import runpy
runpy.run_path('reproduce_issue.py', run_name='__main__')

text='''from matplotlib import pyplot as plt

ax.plot([10, 20], [10, 20])
